author: Snazzy Labs
description:
Apple and Steve Jobs invented the "future of the TV" back in 2007, but missed out on the real winner: the content

The original 2007 Apple TV was secretly a full Mac computer running Mac OS X Tiger with an Intel Pentium M processor and NVIDIA GeForce graphics, not just a streaming box. Despite Steve Jobs positioning it as a simple iTunes sync device, the first-generation Apple TV's x86 architecture enables it to run alternative operating systems including full Mac
title: Apple’s Worst "Mac" EVER!
